```{r}
install.packages("kableExtra") 
library(readxl)  
library(purrr)  #manipulaci贸n de listas y aplicar funciones a cada elemento
library(dplyr)  #manipulaci贸n de datos 
library(tidyr)
library(kableExtra)


path <- "data/calibracion_micropip_agosto.xlsx"
hojas <- excel_sheets(path)

### funci贸n para calcular el CV y redondeo a un decimal
cv <- function(x,...){
  round (sd(x)/mean(x)*100,1)}

datos <- map(hojas, read_xlsx, path = path) |> 
  set_names(hojas) |> 
  map(\(x) summarise(x, across(everything(), list (media = mean, desv = sd, CV= cv),na.rm = TRUE)))
```

```{r}
index=1:5
imap (datos,\(x,index)  kbl(x,caption = names(datos[index])) |> kable_styling("striped"))

```
